title: My creditor is threatening to sue via awa. i asked for debt verification and they sent me a contract with no amount.
question: the billing has very little detail. dues - $200 dining 40. guest fee $150. totaling thousands of dollars.
answers: Unfortunately, validating debt under the FDCPA requires minimal validation - much less so than would be required in court. Sometimes a request for more information will actually get you the additional information needed to make a decision on how to proceed. I would recommend you consult with a consumer or debt attorney to discuss your options to either settle the debt or to defend it in court. Good luck.
you need to do an in person consultation with a local attorney who can review all of your documents.
